name: world-of-warcraft-recruitment
description: World of Warcraft (WoW) Recruitment for Wordpress

scripts.build-sass: npm run node-sass -- scss --output css --output-style compressed
scripts.watch-sass: npm run node-sass -- --watch scss --output css --output-style compressed
scripts.build: npm run http-server -- -p 8001 | npm run build-sass | npm run watch-sass

author: Athlios
